p: The aerial parts of A. membranacea were collected during the spring in the Dab’a desert reserve (50 km South of Amman), Jordan (GPS coordinates: 31° 31’ 58” N, 36° 01’ 20” E). The plant was identified by Prof. A. Bader. A voucher specimen was deposited in the herbarium of the Pharmacognosy Lab (Number Jo-It 2018/2), at Umm Al-Qura University, Makkah, Saudi Arabia.
